Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the image was actually taken at Universal Studios, when in fact it was taken at Bagram Air Field in Afghanistan.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image was digitally manipulated to include a "Universal Studios" sign in the background, which was not present in the original photograph.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that the image was taken at Universal Studios.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the image was staged by Fox News, without providing any evidence to support this claim.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the image was manipulated and falsely attributed to Universal Studios by unknown individuals, rather than being staged by Fox News.
